name: 2025 7th International Conference on Robotics and Intelligent Technology
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer reviewed by both conference committees and IJMERR Editorial Board, and accepted paper will be published in International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research, which will be indexed in ESCI, Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc..
organizers: University of Macau, China & University of Nantes, France
